BF Cannon.description: Increases your attack by 12 and health by 10. The recoil knocks you off your feet.

Big Club.description: Your attacks have a {11*t}% chance to deal 150% bonus damage.

Chumby Chicken.description: The first time you attack each wave, summon a chumby chicken. {t}HP, Heals all allies for {2*t}HP when it dies.

Chicken Dinner.description: When you die on an opponent's turn, your allies all eat you (FLUSH). They heal for {2*t} HP. This item cannot be obtained, so its exact description is unknown.

Cleansing Flames.description: After you attack, you have a 50% chance to heal all allies for {t} HP.

Draining Dagger.description: Your attacks decrease the target's attack by {t}. 20% chance to decrease target's energy by {t}.

Fire Sword.description: When you attack, you have a 30% chance to increase your attack by 1. Repeat this {t-1} additional times.

Healing Pendant.description: Your attacks have a 50% chance to heal yourself for {5*t} HP. {7+3*t}% Chance to take the hit when your teammate is attacked, if you're feeling brave.

Love Letter.description: After you attack, you heal an ally for {2*t} and they gain {t} energy. This cannot target yourself or summons.

Machete.description: Your attacks deal {3*t}-{4*t} damage to an additional enemy.

Magic Parasol.description: When you are attacked, you have a 20% chance to block up to {6*tier} damage. {7+3*t}% Chance to take the hit when your teammate is attacked, if you're feeling brave.

Martyr Armor.description: When you take damage on an opponentâ€™s turn, you have a 66% chance to heal a random ally {2*t}HP and give them {t} Energy. This cannot target yourself or summons.

Pet Imp.description: At the start of the dungeon, summon a big imp companion. {10*t}hp {3*t}-{4*t}atk. Spd: 16

Poison Dagger.description: Your attacks add {t} poison stack to the target. A poisoned enemy takes 1 damage after they attack for each poison stack they have.

Rock Companion.description: At the start of the dungeon, summon a brave Rock Companion. {15*t}hp {5*t}atk 2spd

Rough Skin.description: 50% chance to reduce an attack by {2*t} and deal {2*t} damage to the attacker.

Seeking Missiles.description: Your attacks always target the lowest HP enemy. Deal {t} bonus damage per 20% HP they are missing

Survival Kit.description: Increase Max HP by {20*t}. {7+3*t}% Chance to take a hit when your teammate is attacked if you're feeling brave.

Thorns.description: When you attack, unleash a thorn at each enemy. Each thorn deals {t} damage and gives you a 25% chance to gain {t} energy. You can only gain energy from this effect once per turn.

Trusty Steed.description: At the start of the dungeon, summon a loyal steed... 10 HP, 20 speed. Will boost teammates.

Whirlwind Axe.description: When you attack, you have a {11*t}% chance of making your attack deal splash damage to all other enemies.
